member.name: DirectX.DxcCreateInstance
member.summary: Creates a single uninitialized object of the class associated with a specified CLSID. Also see .
member.param: The CLSID associated with the data and code that will be used to create the object.
A reference to the identifier of the interface to be used to communicate with the object.
Address of pointer variable that receives the interface pointer requested in riid. Upon successful return, *ppv contains the requested interface pointer. Upon failure, *ppv contains NULL.
member.returns: While this function is similar to CoCreateInstance, there's no COM involvement.

member.name: DirectX.DxcCreateInstance2
